Share Zeny I like this app I like this app. https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.nonapp.zeny
//--------------------------------------------------------------// // -- Data Export -- //--------------------------------------------------------------//
Zeny Data Export
//--------------------------------------------------------------// // -- Help Message -- //--------------------------------------------------------------//
About Zeny Zeny is a simple finance manager. Fast You can make an entry very fast. Free You can keep using it for free with ads. Tap [Food] to start.
//--------------------------------------------------------------// // -- All -- //--------------------------------------------------------------//
Add or Edit Accounts Add an Account Are you sure you want to delete this account? You cannot delete the account you are using now, please select other account and try again. The maximum numbers of accounts has been reached already. New account has been created! You can rename it if you tap an account. Import data into Zeny
Hi, this is another nice update.
 
 @Go, Back Button on Date
 
 @Export or Bulk Delete from Search Results
 
 @Copy Button on Edit View
 
 Finally, you can go or back with date button easily. This must be very handy when you want to enter data a lot for your previous date accounting.
 
 As always, I'd really appreciate it if you could review the app on the App Store.
 
 Thanks!

Category Price
Zeny Premium Please login with Zeny Premium account. (You can create it after you subscribed to Zeny Premium.) Your Zeny Premium is active now, but you need to log into your Premium account(not AppleID or PlayStoreID) to use cloud sync (auto-backup). Premium The email address is not registered on Zeny Premium.
Please Create a Zeny Premium account Your Zeny Premium is active now, but please create an account to use cloud sync (auto backup). Zeny Premium Monthly subscription with following features.
1. No Ads
2. Multiple Accounts
3. Cloud Sync with different devices(auto-backup)
4. Recurring Entries
5. Bar Charts
You need to subscribe to Zeny Premium to use multiple accounts, but you can also try it with 10 entries limit for free. Please upgrade to Zeny Premium to make an entry with additional accounts. (You can enter up to 10 with free trial) Please upgrade to Zeny Premium to use the bar charts. (You can try Income and Expense bar charts for free) You need to subscribe to Zeny Premium to use Recurring Entries as it works in the cloud server. Please login to Zeny Premium
If the notification don't work, enable Notifications in the Android Settings => Apps => Zeny => Notifications. Backup your app data into GoogleDrive, Gmail or other services. You can restore your data when you want to transfer your data to other Android devices. Please check Help about how you can backup and restore. (You cannot transfer data between Android and iOS versions with this feature, to do that, you need to use Cloud Sync of Zeny Premium.)
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.nonapp.zeny
